changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO metrics (name,value,type,metric_value_type,metric_validation) VALUES ('coverage','coverage','SONAR','NUMERIC','LTE'), ('alert status','alert_status','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('bugs','bugs','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('reliability rating','reliability_rating','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('vulnerabilities','vulnerabilities','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('security rating','security_rating','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('security hotspots reviewed','security_hotspots_reviewed','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('security review rating','security_review_rating','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('code smells','code_smells','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('sqale rating','sqale_rating','SONAR',NULL,NULL); INSERT INTO metrics (name,value,type,metric_value_type,metric_validation) VALUES ('duplicated lines density','duplicated_lines_density','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('ncloc','ncloc','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('ncloc language distribution','ncloc_language_distribution','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('projects','projects','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('info violations','info_violations','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('minor violations','minor_violations','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('major violations','major_violations','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('critical violations','critical_violations','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('blocker violations','blocker_violations','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'); INSERT INTO metrics (name,value,type,metric_value_type,metric_validation) VALUES ('parent version','parent/version','GIT_XML','VERSION','LTE'), ('bff java version','properties/java.version','GIT_XML','VERSION','LTE'), ('rws java version','properties/java.version','GIT_XML','VERSION','LTE'), ('angular version','devDependencies.@angular/cli','GIT_JSON','VERSION','LTE');
